briefTitle: Empagliflozin Add on to Linagliptin Study in Japanese Patient With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomised, Double-blind, Parallel Group, 52 Week Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Once Daily Empagliflozin and Linagliptin Fixed Dose Combination Compared With Linagliptin Plus Placebo in Japanese Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients With Insufficient Glycaemic Control After 16 Weeks Treatment With Once Daily Linagliptin 5 mg.

interventions.name: Empagliflozin placebo + linagliptin placebo low dose

summary: This trial will compare the use of fixed dose combination of empagliflozin and linagliptin to linagliptin alone in patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus

primaryOutcome.measure: Change of Glycosylated Haemoglobin A1c (Glycosylated Haemoglobin A1c After 24 Weeks of Double-blind Treatment From Baseline)
